verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Then the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses בֹּ֖א <S%H935><s%> Go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פַּרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> in unto Pharaoh וְדִבַּרְתָּ֣ <S%H1696><s%> and tell אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> him Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God הָֽעִבְרִ֔ים <S%H5680><s%> of the Hebrews שַׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> go אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> Let my people וְיַֽעַבְדֻֽנִי׃ <S%H5647><s%> that they may serve

כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> For אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if מָאֵ֥ן <S%H3986><s%> For if thou refuse אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you לְשַׁלֵּ֑חַ <S%H7971><s%> to let [them] go וְעוֹדְךָ֖ <S%H5750><s%> and continue מַחֲזִ֥יק <S%H2388><s%> and wilt hold בָּֽם׃

הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> behold יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> Behold the hand יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הוֹיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> is בְּמִקְנְךָ֙ <S%H4735><s%> upon thy cattle אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> which [is] in the field בַּסּוּסִ֤ים <S%H5483><s%> upon the horses בַּֽחֲמֹרִים֙ <S%H2543><s%> upon the asses בַּגְּמַלִּ֔ים <S%H1581><s%> upon the camels בַּבָּקָ֖ר <S%H1241><s%> upon the oxen וּבַצֹּ֑אן <S%H6629><s%> and upon the sheep דֶּ֖בֶר <S%H1698><s%> murrain כָּבֵ֥ד <S%H3515><s%> grievous מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> [there shall be] a very

וְהִפְלָ֣ה <S%H6395><s%> shall sever יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD בֵּ֚ין <S%H996><s%> between מִקְנֵ֣ה <S%H4735><s%> between the cattle יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּבֵ֖ין <S%H996><s%> between מִקְנֵ֣ה <S%H4735><s%> and the cattle מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יָמ֛וּת <S%H4191><s%> die מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of all [that is] the children's יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> and there shall nothing

וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> appointed יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD מוֹעֵ֣ד <S%H4150><s%> a set time לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying מָחָ֗ר <S%H4279><s%> To morrow יַעֲשֶׂ֧ה <S%H6213><s%> shall do יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הַדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> this thing הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> in the land

וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֤ר <S%H1697><s%> that thing הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this מִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <S%H4283><s%> on the morrow וַיָּ֕מָת <S%H4191><s%> died כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> and all מִקְנֵ֣ה <S%H4735><s%> and all the cattle מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian וּמִמִּקְנֵ֥ה <S%H4735><s%> but of the cattle בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not מֵ֥ת <S%H4191><s%> died אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> not one

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> sent פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> And Pharaoh וְהִנֵּ֗ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not מֵ֛ת <S%H4191><s%> dead מִמִּקְנֵ֥ה <S%H4735><s%> of the cattle יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of the Israelites עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> even אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> and behold there was not one וַיִּכְבַּד֙ <S%H3513><s%> was hardened לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> And the heart פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not שִׁלַּ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> go אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> and he did not let the people פ

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> and אַהֲרֹן֒ <S%H175><s%> and unto Aaron קְח֤וּ <S%H3947><s%> Take לָכֶם֙ מְלֹ֣א <S%H4393><s%> all along חָפְנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H2651><s%> fists פִּ֖יחַ <S%H6368><s%> of ashes כִּבְשָׁ֑ן <S%H3536><s%> of the furnace וּזְרָק֥וֹ <S%H2236><s%> sprinkle מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> and let Moses הַשָּׁמַ֖יְמָה <S%H8064><s%> it toward the heaven לְעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight פַרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh

וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> will become לְאָבָ֔ק <S%H80><s%> And it shall become small dust עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in all the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְהָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> and will become עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הָאָדָ֜ם <S%H120><s%> upon man וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַבְּהֵמָ֗ה <S%H929><s%> and upon beast לִשְׁחִ֥ין <S%H7822><s%> and shall be a boil פֹּרֵ֛חַ <S%H6524><s%> breaking forth אֲבַעְבֻּעֹ֖ת <S%H76><s%> [with] blains בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> throughout all the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וַיִּקְח֞וּ <S%H3947><s%> And they took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּ֣יחַ <S%H6368><s%> ashes הַכִּבְשָׁ֗ן <S%H3536><s%> of the furnace וַיַּֽעַמְדוּ֙ <S%H5975><s%> and stood לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before פַרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh וַיִּזְרֹ֥ק <S%H2236><s%> sprinkled אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> and Moses הַשָּׁמָ֑יְמָה <S%H8064><s%> it up toward heaven וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> became שְׁחִין֙ <S%H7822><s%> and it became a boil אֲבַעְבֻּעֹ֔ת <S%H76><s%> [with] blains פֹּרֵ֕חַ <S%H6524><s%> breaking forth בָּאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> upon man וּבַבְּהֵמָֽה׃ <S%H929><s%> and upon beast

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָכְל֣וּ <S%H3201><s%> could הַֽחַרְטֻמִּ֗ים <S%H2748><s%> And the magicians לַעֲמֹ֛ד <S%H5975><s%> not stand לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> because הַשְּׁחִ֑ין <S%H7822><s%> of the boils כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become הַשְּׁחִ֔ין <S%H7822><s%> for the boil בַּֽחֲרְטֻמִּ֖ם <S%H2748><s%> was upon the magicians וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian

וַיְחַזֵּ֤ק <S%H2388><s%> hardened יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> the heart פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> and he hearkened אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> about כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> had spoken יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> not unto them as the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses הַשְׁכֵּ֣ם <S%H7925><s%> Rise up early בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וְהִתְיַצֵּ֖ב <S%H3320><s%> and stand לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before פַרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> and say אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> unto him Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God הָֽעִבְרִ֔ים <S%H5680><s%> of the Hebrews שַׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> go אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> Let my people וְיַֽעַבְדֻֽנִי׃ <S%H5647><s%> that they may serve

כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for בַּפַּ֣עַם <S%H6471><s%> For I will at this time הַזֹּ֗את <S%H2063><s%> likewise אֲנִ֨י <S%H589><s%> I שֹׁלֵ֜חַ <S%H7971><s%> send אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַגֵּפֹתַי֙ <S%H4046><s%> all my plagues אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> upon לִבְּךָ֔ <S%H3820><s%> upon thine heart וּבַעֲבָדֶ֖יךָ <S%H5650><s%> and upon thy servants וּבְעַמֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5971><s%> and upon thy people בַּעֲב֣וּר <S%H5668><s%> so תֵּדַ֔ע <S%H3045><s%> that thou mayest know כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> that אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there כָּמֹ֖נִי <S%H3644><s%> like בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> that [there is] none like me in all the earth

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For עַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> now שָׁלַ֣חְתִּי <S%H7971><s%> For now I will stretch out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדִ֔י <S%H3027><s%> my hand וָאַ֥ךְ <S%H5221><s%> that I may smite אוֹתְךָ֛ <S%H853><s%> וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמְּךָ֖ <S%H5971><s%> thee and thy people בַּדָּ֑בֶר <S%H1698><s%> with pestilence וַתִּכָּחֵ֖ד <S%H3582><s%> and thou shalt be cut off מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> from the earth

וְאוּלָ֗ם <S%H199><s%> And in very בַּעֲב֥וּר <S%H5668><s%> deed זֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> you הֶעֱמַדְתִּ֔יךָ <S%H5975><s%> for this [cause] have I raised thee up בַּעֲב֖וּר <S%H5668><s%> order הַרְאֹתְךָ֣ <S%H7200><s%> for to shew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כֹּחִ֑י <S%H3581><s%> [in] thee my power וּלְמַ֛עַן <S%H4616><s%> order סַפֵּ֥ר <S%H5608><s%> may be declared שְׁמִ֖י <S%H8034><s%> and that my name בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> throughout all the earth

עוֹדְךָ֖ <S%H5750><s%> Still מִסְתּוֹלֵ֣ל <S%H5549><s%> As yet exaltest בְּעַמִּ֑י <S%H5971><s%> thou thyself against my people לְבִלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> not שַׁלְּחָֽם׃ <S%H7971><s%> that thou wilt not let them go

הִנְנִ֤י <S%H2005><s%> behold מַמְטִיר֙ <S%H4305><s%> I will cause it to rain כָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> about this time מָחָ֔ר <S%H4279><s%> Behold to morrow בָּרָ֖ד <S%H1259><s%> hail כָּבֵ֣ד <S%H3515><s%> grievous מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> a very אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> such לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> has not הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> been כָמֹ֙הוּ֙ <S%H3644><s%> such as hath not been בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> in Egypt לְמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> since הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the day הִוָּסְדָ֖ה <S%H3245><s%> founded וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until עָֽתָּה׃ <S%H6258><s%> now

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now שְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> Send הָעֵז֙ <S%H5756><s%> therefore now [and] gather אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> מִקְנְךָ֔ <S%H4735><s%> thy cattle וְאֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after לְךָ֖ בַּשָּׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> and all that thou hast in the field כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every הָאָדָ֨ם <S%H120><s%> [for upon] every man וְהַבְּהֵמָ֜ה <S%H929><s%> and beast אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> is יִמָּצֵ֣א <S%H4672><s%> which shall be found בַשָּׂדֶ֗ה <S%H7704><s%> in the field וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not יֵֽאָסֵף֙ <S%H622><s%> and shall not be brought הַבַּ֔יְתָה <S%H1004><s%> home וְיָרַ֧ד <S%H3381><s%> shall come down עֲלֵהֶ֛ם <S%H5921><s%> when הַבָּרָ֖ד <S%H1259><s%> the hail וָמֵֽתוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> upon them and they shall die

הַיָּרֵא֙ <S%H3372><s%> feared אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מֵֽעַבְדֵ֖י <S%H5650><s%> among the servants פַּרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh הֵנִ֛יס <S%H5127><s%> flee אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲבָדָ֥יו <S%H5650><s%> made his servants וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִקְנֵ֖הוּ <S%H4735><s%> and his cattle אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַבָּתִּֽים׃ <S%H1004><s%> into the houses

וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no שָׂ֛ם <S%H7760><s%> paid לִבּ֖וֹ <S%H3820><s%> care for אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דְּבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> not the word יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַֽיַּעֲזֹ֛ב <S%H5800><s%> left אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲבָדָ֥יו <S%H5650><s%> his servants וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִקְנֵ֖הוּ <S%H4735><s%> and his cattle בַּשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <S%H7704><s%> in the field פ
